synopsis.text:
Academy Tracen transforms into a lively training ground where equine-inspired girls race, perform, and hone their skills in this delightful, bite-sized anime adaptation of "Umayon." Based on the charming 4-koma manga, this spin-off of "Starting Gate!: Uma Musume Pretty Derby" invites you to experience the everyday school lives of these horse girls.

From re-examinations that escalate into full-blown competitions to the creation of a promotional video that turns into a game of scene-stealing, these horse girls are anything but ordinary. With a variety of events ranging from acting and eating contests to bug hunts and daring challenges, there's never a dull moment at Tracen Academy.

Join the horse girls in their laidback school days filled with laughter, camaraderie, and endless entertainment. So, saddle up and dive into the enchanting world of Umayon, where the fun never stops, and the horse girls are always ready to gallop their way into your heart.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
